Interface ShortRateModel

All Superinterfaces:
ProcessModel, TermStructureModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
HullWhiteModel
public interface ShortRateModel extends TermStructureModel
Interface for Short Rate models which are determined by a ShortRateVolatilityModelInterface.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Christian Fries
